description.0: A graceful and elegant greatsword that is decorated with flowers and ribbons.

0.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> and <cryo>48</cryo> respectively.

1.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>15%</cryo> and <cryo>60</cryo> respectively.

2.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>18%</cryo> and <cryo>72</cryo> respectively.

3.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>21%</cryo> and <cryo>84</cryo> respectively.

4.0: Within 8s after the character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent or the character triggers an Elemental Reaction, their ATK and Elemental Mastery will be increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> and <cryo>96</cryo> respectively.
